channel.title: [PI] Adding Commands [PI]
channel.description:
I want to add this command [code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("moneygod") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ivengence") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("wildking72"))) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }[/code]
But idk how to add it right i keep getting error:(

item.title: [PI] Adding Commands [PI]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz, post:7, topic:392807”][quote author=wildskiller link=topic=489975.msg3582672#msg3582672 date=1303920213]
ok ive got a picture of the errors…how do i put them on here?
[/quote]
no in your cmd prompt that you get your errors on you can right click it and click mark then click at the very top where your errors stop and drag it to the bottom and hit the enter button and then just paste it here so we can see the errors.[/quote] ty

item.title: [PI] Adding Commands [PI]
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

wildskiller:

ok ive got a picture of the errors…how do i put them on here?

no in your cmd prompt that you get your errors on you can right click it and click mark then click at the very top where your errors stop and drag it to the bottom and hit the enter button and then just paste it here so we can see the errors.
